title: Collaborative Learning-Based E-Learning Design for Christian Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Christian education concepts and online learning tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Project-based educational curriculum conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative learning designs comparing and contrasting Christian education themes at least once
Learners can design two or more e-learning scenarios applying scaffolding strategies using the LAMS tool
Learners can collaboratively develop Christian ethics-related educational materials through peer evaluation and feedback

resources: Open educational content related to Christian education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
